name: The Tower Jam
description:
this is my first game jam game ever. the next one will be better. i have chronic pain and i made this game by working 3-4 hours a day for 4 weeks. during a economic crash and a fricking pandemic no less. 

thanks content makers. thanks to OpenGameArt.org for putting up the whole site to make prototyping easier. but thanks most of all to 2 people:

  • my mom for buying me a computer and buying all this electricity for me to use it with. 
  • future wife without who's this wouldnt have been possible for a hundred reasons.

credits:

1. Name: 200+ Tileset - Mega Metroidvania https://opengameart.org/content/200-tileset-mega-metroidvania Author: Chad Wolfe https://opengameart.org/users/the-chayed License: CC-by-3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Attribution: 200+ Tileset - Mega Metroidvania by Chad Wolfe

2. Name: LPC Sign Post https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-sign-post Author: Nemisys https://opengameart.org/users/nemisys License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Attribution: LPC Sign Post by Nemisys

3. Name: wind loop https://opengameart.org/content/wind-loop Author: Jordan Irwin https://opengameart.org/users/antumdeluge License: cc3 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Attribution: Wind Loop by Jordan Irwin

4. Name: 8-BIT Jump #1 https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jump-1 Author: Jesús Lastra https://opengameart.org/users/jalastram License: cc3 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Attribution: 8-BIT Jump #1 by Jesús Lastra

5. Name: Slow Melancholic Theme C64 Style https://opengameart.org/content/slow-melancholic-theme-c64-style Author: Martin Nilsson https://opengameart.org/users/skrjablin License: cc0, cc3 http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ & http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Attribution:

Slow Melancholic Theme C64 Style by Martin Nilsson

6. Name: tilesets remixed from the Chayed https://opengameart.org/content/tilesets-remixed-from-the-chayed 

Author: Eli Gross (remixed from attribution one-> Chad Wolfe) https://opengameart.org/content/tilesets-remixed-from-the-chayed License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Attribution: tilesets remixed from the Chayed by Eli Gross and Chad

thank you. thank you. thank you. long live the fighters.
